author: Netwitness

automation.description: Use this script to display meta events inside the layout.
automation.name: RSA_DisplayMetasEvents

automation.description: This automation takes several alert fields from the RSA NetWitness alerts context and displays them as markdown in the layout.
automation.name: SetRSANetWitnessAlertsMD

automation.description: Use this script to get RAW log.
automation.name: RSA_GetRawLog

commands.description: Delete a specific incident, by its id.
commands.name: netwitness-delete-incident

commands.description: Update a specific incident.  Currently, an incident's status and assignee may be modified
commands.name: netwitness-update-incident

commands.description: Get details of a specific incident, including all alerts related with the incident.
commands.name: netwitness-get-incident

commands.description: Get a list of incidents in a specific time frame. One of the followings must be specified:  since, until, lastDays
commands.name: netwitness-get-incidents

commands.description: Get all the alerts related to a specific incident.
commands.name: netwitness-get-alerts

integration.description: Deprecated. Use RSA NetWitness v11.5 instead
integration.name: RSA NetWitness v11.1 (Deprecated) (Partner Contribution)

commands.description: Gets all alerts triggered for a given host.
commands.name: rsa-nw-host-alerts-list

commands.description: Gets data from a remote incident. This method does not update the current incident, and should be used for debugging purposes only.
commands.name: get-remote-data

commands.description: Initiate file download for a single file or multiple files to the endpoint server.
commands.name: rsa-nw-file-download

commands.description: Retrieves all the alerts that are associated with an incident based on the incident ID. you can limit the results using the limit argument or the page size argument.
commands.name: rsa-nw-incident-list-alerts

commands.description: Provides snapshot details of the given host for the specified snapshot time. It is recommended to use categories to filter the results since this command returns a large amount of data.
commands.name: rsa-nw-snapshot-details-get

commands.description: Updates the remote incident with local incident changes. This method is only used for debugging purposes and will not update the current incident.
commands.name: update-remote-system

commands.description: Starts a scan for the host with the specified agent ID. Each scan produces a snapshot, the full details can be seen using the 'rsa-nw-snapshot-details-get' command.
commands.name: rsa-nw-scan-request

commands.description: Lists all related file information from a specific endpoint server. You can limit the results using the limit argument or the page size argument.
commands.name: rsa-nw-files-list

commands.description: Retrieves a list of all services, or filter by name.
commands.name: rsa-nw-services-list

commands.description: Remove a single incident using the incident's unique identifier.
commands.name: rsa-nw-remove-incident

commands.description: Initiates the download of the process dump to the endpoint server. You can find the process details by using the 'rsa-nw-snapshot-details-get' and filter by category=PROCESSES, or use the RSA NW UI.
commands.name: rsa-nw-process-dump-download-request

commands.description: Gets all alerts triggered for a given file.
commands.name: rsa-nw-file-alerts-list

commands.description: Returns the list of fields to map in outgoing mirroring. This command is only used for debugging purposes.
commands.name: get-mapping-fields

commands.description: Retrieve a list os snapshot IDs for a given host.
commands.name: rsa-nw-snapshots-list-for-host

commands.description: Restores the network connection and removes IP addresses added to the exclusion list for the host with the specified agent ID.
commands.name: rsa-nw-endpoint-isolation-remove

commands.description: Stop a scan for the host with the specified agent ID.
commands.name: rsa-nw-scan-stop-request

commands.description: Updates incident status and assignee.
commands.name: rsa-nw-update-incident

commands.description: Lists all host information from a specific endpoint server. Filter the results using the supplied arguments (can be a list) or use the 'filter' argument. You can limit the results using the limit argument or the page size argument.
commands.name: rsa-nw-hosts-list

commands.description: Retrieves a single incident by ID or multiple incidents by the date and time they were created using the start time ('since') or end time ('until'). You can limit the results using the limit argument or the page size argument. If no arguments are entered the last 50 results are returned.
commands.name: rsa-nw-list-incidents

commands.description: Retrieves host information for a specific endpoint. To use this command, service ID must be set in the integration configuration.
commands.name: endpoint

commands.description: Initiates the download of the system dump to the endpoint server.
commands.name: rsa-nw-system-dump-download-request

commands.description: Gets the list of incidents and detections that were modified since the last update time. This method is used for debugging purposes.
commands.name: get-modified-remote-data

commands.description: Updates the network isolation exclusion list for the host with the specified agent ID.
commands.name: rsa-nw-endpoint-update-exclusions

commands.description: Initiates the MFT download to the endpoint server.
commands.name: rsa-nw-mft-download-request

commands.description: Isolates the host with the specified agent ID from the network.
commands.name: rsa-nw-endpoint-isolate-from-network

commands.description: Add a journal entry to an existing incident.
commands.name: rsa-nw-incident-add-journal-entry

integration.description: The RSA NetWitness integration provides system log, network, and endpoint visibility for real-time collection, detection, and automated response with the Cortex XSOAR Enterprise platform. Using full session analysis, customers can extract critical data and effectively run security operations automated playbooks.
integration.name: RSANetWitness v11.5 (Partner Contribution)

description: RSA NetWitness Platform provides systems Logs, Network, and endpoint visibility for real-time collection, detection, and automated response with the Demisto Enterprise platform. Providing full session analysis, customers can extract critical data and effectively operate security operations automated playbook.
name: RSA NetWitness
readme:
RSA NetWitness provides your security team with the visibility it needs to detect sophisticated threats to your system. It collects and analyzes data across all capture points and computing platforms enriching data with threat intelligence and business context.

## What does this pack do?
- Isolate/unisolate infected endpoints.
- Get alerts triggered for a given host.
- Retrieve the alerts that are associated with an incident.
- List, update, remove incidents.
- Get snapshots for a given host.
- List all related file information from a specific endpoint server and downloading files.
- Scan a host.

Note: Support for this Pack moved to the partner on 04, 17, 2024.

Please contact the partner directly via the support link on the right.
